comments.html: Thanks for the explanation. Will test 23.2R1-S1 when it becomes available.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
Hi Ivan and all, vJunosEvolved 23.2R1-S1 is posted now. https://support.juniper.net/support/downloads/?p=vjunos-evolved

Note: There is no need of external bridges mention in the deployment from this release onwards.

KVM deployment guide with the updated steps (eliminate external bridges)

https://www.juniper.net/documentation/us/en/software/vJunosEvolved/vjunos-evolved-kvm/index.html

Thanks.
comments.name: Vignesh S

comments.html: Hi Ivan, this release is affected by Juniper PR 1743277. I think you're seeing the same problem. This was because the underlying DHCP client script was being executed via Python2 when it was not supported. The fix was to change it to Python3. You should see 23.2R1-S1 released shortly, which has the fix.
comments.name: Aninda Chatterjee
